Package jakarta.nosql.mapping.document

Interface DocumentTemplate

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Template
    public interface DocumentTemplate
extends Template
    DocumentTemplate is a helper class that increases productivity when performing common DocumentEntity operations. Includes integrated object mapping between documents and POJOs. It represents the common operation between an entity and DocumentCollectionManager
    See Also:
    DocumentCollectionManager

      • singleResult

        <T> Optional<T> singleResult​(DocumentQuery query)
        Returns a single entity from query
        Type Parameters:
        T - the instance type
        Parameters:
        query - - query to figure out entities
        Returns:
        an entity on Optional or Optional.empty() when the result is not found.
        Throws:
        NonUniqueResultException - when the result has more than 1 entity
        NullPointerException - when query is null

      • singleResult

        <T> Optional<T> singleResult​(String query)
        Executes a query then bring the result as a unique result
        Type Parameters:
        T - the entity type
        Parameters:
        query - the query
        Returns:
        the result as Optional
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - when the query is null
        NonUniqueResultException - if returns more than one result
        UnsupportedOperationException - if the specified template does not support this operation
